content: How does revoking a contrib module release work? On Github I could delete it, but how does this work with the packaging and backdropcms-org? What needs to be taken care of?
Someone with access can delete/unpublish the release node. Which project/release @indigoxela ?

@klonos it's https://github.com/backdrop-contrib/details_html5. It has been released today, but a quick check showed that it's currently pretty broken - not ready yet for a stable release. I'm unsure, though, if I should delete the Github release, because I didn't release it (I'm listed as maintainer... but...). Anyway - nobody should consider it "stable".

backdrop-contrib/details_html5
Adds a "details" Form API field type that renders the HTML5 details element. - backdrop-contrib/details_html5
Never mind, it's not necessary anymore. :smile:
